title: Full Stack AI Developer
description:
**HAYPP GROUP**
 We address one of the world’s biggest problems – how to end smoking. There are 1,1 billion smokers in the world. Around 8 million people die every year from smoking-related diseases. Our goal is to significantly reduce death rates, save lives and inspire people to choose healthier enjoyment. How? By offering people safer nicotine online.
   

  

 Haypp Group is one of the Nordics’ leading e-commerce groups with ten store brands, present in seven countries where we serve more than 1 million active consumers. Through brands such as Snusbolaget.se, Northerner.com, Nicokick.com etc., we sell nicotine pouches, Swedish style snus online as well as disposable vapes. With our headquarters located on Östgötagatan in Stockholm we are 250 team members mainly but not exclusively based in Sweden. Also, we are an innovative and fast-moving company that is growing rapidly, driving sustainable business and are changing the world in the process. We are currently on an exciting expansion journey, converting more and more smokers to healthier alternatives across all our markets globally.
   

  

**THE ROLE**
 Join our Efficiency Team as a Full Stack AI Developer, where you'll be at the forefront of transforming business processes through innovative AI solutions. In this role, you'll develop comprehensive AI applications that enhance operational efficiency across our organization. You'll work together with our Business Process Analyst and Automation Engineer to create seamless, integrated systems that drive productivity and innovation. Experience in building enterprise-grade customer service chatbots is a plus but not required.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
**AI Application Development:**
* Design, develop, test, and deploy full stack AI applications that streamline business processes.
* Integrate AI models with both front-end and back-end systems to ensure robust and user-friendly applications.


**Collaboration & Integration:**
* Work closely with the Efficiency Team to translate business process insights into effective AI-driven solutions.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of AI applications with existing systems.


**Innovation & Continuous Improvement:**
* Research and implement cutting-edge AI technologies and frameworks to drive continuous improvement.
* Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in AI and full stack development.


**Optional Chatbot Development:**
* Utilize experience (if applicable) in building enterprise-grade customer service chatbots to enhance customer interaction channels.


**What We Want From You**
 For us, it is equally important to find the right fit on an interpersonal level between us and a new colleague as it is to find someone with the right experience and competence. Successful candidates also meet the following requirements
   

  

**Technical Expertise:**
* Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer with a focus on AI and machine learning applications.
* Strong proficiency in front-end and back-end technologies (e.g., JavaScript, Python, Node.js, etc.).
* Experience with AI frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.) and RESTful API design.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and containerization tools is highly desirable.


**Collaborative Skills:**
* Excellent problem-solving abilities and the capacity to work effectively in a multidisciplinary team.
* Strong communication skills to clearly articulate technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.


**Preferred Qualifications:**
* Experience in developing enterprise-grade customer service chatbots is an added advantage.
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (Master’s degree preferred).


**What We Offer**
 We are a value driven company with our values
 *We team up* 
 ,
 *Innovation Drives Us* 
 ,
 *No Douchebags* 
 and
 *Going the Extra Mile* 
 at the heartbeat of everything that we do. With us you can always expect to get help from people who want to achieve things together and to be able to speak your mind in every social constellation you are part of. We highly value all ideas no matter where they come from, and we are not afraid to try new things out. We are also welcoming, inclusive and everyone at Haypp Group has a voice. In addition, we seize opportunities by putting in hands-on, hard work and celebrating when we reach our goals. With us, you should always feel safe, appreciated and valued but at the same time challenged and excited.
   

  

 Because we recognize that our team members are our most important differentiator, we offer our team members generous benefits. We offer the following perks to everyone at Haypp Group:
   

  

* Premium ITP1 occupational pension savings plan
* Insurance plan, including private healthcare
* 30 days of paid vacation
* Parental pay lift
* Wellness allowance of 5,000 SEK per year
* Lots of social happenings


**SEND US YOUR APPLICATION TODAY!**
 If this sounds like a place where you would want to contribute and grow, let us know you’re interested by submitting your application! Apply with your CV, a cover letter, through Linkedin or in any other way you feel represents you in the clearest possible way. All ways of connecting work for us!
   

  

 Haypp Group is committed to equality and diversity, and we welcome applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, religion, age, gender, sexual orientation, disability, and marital status. We want to offer you great recruitment experience, and if there is anything we can do to make you more comfortable in the process with us, please let us know.
   

  

 If you have any questions about the role or what it’s like to work at Haypp Group in general, feel free to reach out to our responsible recruiter Viktoria Sobolewski at viktoria.sobolewski@hayppgroup.com. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 The Haypp Group is spearheading the global transformation from smoking to healthier product alternatives. With origins in Scandinavia our extensive experience from pioneering markets in smoke free alternatives, as well as being a leader in the e-commerce sector, we now fully bring our vision to a global scale.
   

  

 With ten e-commerce brands, the Haypp Group is present in seven countries where we serve more than 950 000 consumers.

title: Fullstack Developer - AI Team
description:
Odevo is a group of exciting brands with a shared vision of challenging status quo in the property management industry. We are committed to revolutionizing the industry with innovative software solutions that make managing properties easier, more efficient, and more effective. Our rapidly growing product and engineering organization is approaching 150 highly skilled professionals.
   

  

 Our cloud-based platform is unique, and in a brief time, we have proven ourselves as a leading and innovative player on the market. Our product development department acts as a SaaS supplier to all the companies in the Odevo group and several other players in the industry. Together, we will continue to challenge and change this industry. To continue our ambitious growth journey, we seek more great people to join us to build market-leading property management software products. Are you one of them?
   

  

**The Role**
 As a Fullstack Developer in the AI team, you will be responsible for our organization's AI-focused initiatives, creating transformative solutions for our business opportunities. With your expertise as a developer, you and your team will lead the charge in building end-to-end solutions that help us deliver efficiency gains to our customers.
   

  

 You will be pivotal in defining how we apply Generative AI solutions to business problems, mainly through usage of LLMs from various providers. We want to deeply integrate AI across our organization, drive innovation and ensure that AI is a clear part of our business strategy.
   

  

 For this role, deep AI expertise is not a requirement, we already have AI expertise in the team. Instead, we are looking for experienced Fullstack Developers that can craft systems directly from customer requirements, spanning design, frontend, backend, databases, all the way to deployments and infrastructure.
   

  

 You will be reporting to our AI Engineering Manager.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You are an experienced and driven software engineer who has shipped applications to real users. Complex challenges do not deter you; they intrigue you. You tackle them methodically, finding practical solutions that truly make a difference.
   

  

 You prefer working in a team with developers, designers and product managers and deeply collaborate with your team rather than working from specifications. You communicate effectively and can discuss the pros and cons of different options in constructive ways.
   

  

 You find AI developments interesting, and have experimented with them, and are eager to learn more.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* As part of a cross-functional team, you will collaborate to define requirements, implement, deliver and improve AI solutions that meet business needs.
* Stay up to date with the latest developments in generative AI, reading up on open-source projects and exploring AI technologies that can benefit the organization.
* Create prototypes and proof-of-concepts to demonstrate the feasibility and potential of solutions to stakeholders.
* Document architecture designs, algorithms, and best practices for knowledge sharing within the organization.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science, Machine Learning, or a related field.
* Experience in backend development using Python and FastAPI, and React for frontend development. Experience from other languages is also valued as we’re always open to using the best tool for the task at hand.
* Proven experience with building applications for real users, spanning design, frontend, backend, databases and infrastructure. We don’t require deep experience in all areas.
* You will be asked to demo your experience in the interview process
* Proficiency in Swedish


**What We Offer**
* Professional growth - to work with the most talented developers in the industry.
* Modern technology - we invest in the latest technologies and tools, we sign agreements with the largest players, and we encourage our team members to share their ideas and take ownership of their work to form a collaborative environment where AI is used throughout the group.
* Innovation - to work on exciting projects that push the boundaries of our industry and make a real impact.
* Commitment to quality - a dynamic and forward-thinking company that values profitable and long-term product development.


**Location**
 We find great value in being able to work closely with our Stockholm-based team in person. At the same time, we understand the need to focus deeply without interruptions. Therefore, the team works according to a hybrid setup with 3 days at the Stockholm office, and 2 days remotely from home, combining the best of both worlds.
   

  

**Excited?**
 If you are excited about being part of a successful team, apply for this position!
   

  

 👉🏽 Why we formed Odevo
   

  

 🔍 About Odevo
   

  

 🌐 Our Software

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Senior Full-Stack Engineer (TypeScript / Node.js / React)
 



  





 📍 Stockholm-based (Hybrid or Remote)
 



 🕒 Full-time
 



 📬 careers@venga.app
 



  





**Venga is building a new kind of social platform—think Spotify, but for your real-life plans.** 




  





 We're a Stockholm-based team on a mission to make it ridiculously easy and fun to bring people together. Whether it’s a dinner, party, or weekend trip, Venga helps people plan, invite, and celebrate—without the group chat chaos or outdated tools.
 



  





 We’re backed by top Nordic VCs, and our team brings experience from companies like Budbee (Instabee), Spotify, Klarna, and Qasa. The foundation is in place: a beautiful product, a growing user base, and momentum. Now we’re ready to scale—and we’re looking for an engineer who wants to build something big from the inside.
 



  





**What you’ll do** 



* Work across the stack with TypeScript, Node.js, React, and React Native
* Build and maintain our core platform across Web, iOS, and Android
* Collaborate closely with design, growth, product and our CTO to ship meaningful features fast
* Shape architecture, scalability, and tooling as we grow
* Help us build a truly delightful, high-performance app



  





**What we’re looking for** 



* 3+ years experience with full-stack JavaScript/TypeScript development
* Strong grasp of backend systems (Node.js, REST APIs, databases)
* Solid frontend skills (React/React Native, CSS, UI/UX sensibility)
* Experience working in early-stage or fast-moving product teams
* A builder’s mindset—you care about product, not just code <3



  





**What we offer** 



* Real ownership with highly valuable equity options
* The chance to join early in something big
* Flat, fast-paced and creative culture (we move fast and love it)
* Work with a fun, ambitious team who love what they do
* Hybrid flexibility, but with our home base in central Stockholm



  





 This is a rare opportunity to be part of shaping what a social platform can be—built in Europe, with people and integrity at the core.
 



  





 📩 Ready to join? Email us at careers@venga.app or ping us and we’ll take it from there.

title: Software Engineer till sj.se
description:
Är du vår nya Software Engineer med kunskaper i Java 21, Spring Boot och React? Vill du arbeta i en inkluderande kulturen där vi peppar varandra och där du har möjlighet att påverka dina arbetsuppgifter? Vi söker nu ytterligare en grym utvecklare till ett av våra team som ansvarar för kärnfunktionalitet i SJs webblösning.
 



**Din kommande roll** 
 :
   

 Du kommer att vara en del av ett team med övergripande ansvar för frontend-arkitekturen på SJ:s webb. Teamet utvecklar en container-applikation i React som samlar ett antal micro frontends. Utöver detta konfigurerar de vårt CMS och analytics och utvecklar mindre applikationer för både internt och externt bruk. Dessa applikationer byggs med React i frontend och Java i backend. All utveckling är molnbaserad och vi driftar våra egna system. Teamet består av fyra utvecklare, en produktägare och en UX-designer med stor frihet i val av både tekniker och arbetssätt. För oss är det viktigt att du har stort självledarskap, nyfiken och en prestigelös lagspelare. Vi använder agila arbetsmetoder med en grund i SAFe och teamen arbetar tvärfunktionellt. Hos oss får du bygga och förädla applikationer som är viktiga på riktigt och som måste fungera 24/7.
   

**Rollen innebär att:** 



* Du kommer att vara involverad i förvaltning, utveckling och testautomatisering.
* Vidareutveckla vår funktionalitet i webblösningen med fokus på användarvänlighet, funktionalitet, devops/finops och säkerhet.
* Vara självgående och framåtlutad i utvecklingsarbetet.



**Förväntningar på dig:**
 Du behöver ha god social förmåga och positiv attityd. Vi arbetar verksamhetsnära och det är en fördel om du har verksamhetsförståelse för våra användare och kunder.
   

**Vi söker dig som har:** 



* Flera års erfarenhet som utvecklare
* Teknisk kompetens inom Java, Spring Boot, React och TypeScript
* Erfarenhet av molntjänster, företrädesvis Azure
* Behärska svenska i tal och skrift



**Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:** 



* Progressive Web Apps
* Adobe Experience Platform och Customer Journey Analytics
* DevOps och FinOps
* Certifiering inom Microsoft Azure



**Ansökan och information** 
  

 Urval sker löpande. Anställningen är på hundra procent och vårt kontor är beläget i Stockholm centrum på Vasagatan 10. Vi erbjuder en hybrid-modell där du som anställd förväntas närvara på kontoret ca 2-3 dagar/vecka.
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan!**

title: Systemarkitekt / Lead developer .NET
description:
*Vill du arbeta i en nyckelroll där din tekniska kompetens gör konkret samhällsnytta?* 




*På SOS Alarm får du vara med och bygga robusta, pålitliga system som räddar liv. Vi söker nu en person med bakgrund inom utveckling som vill ta ansvar för att omvandla visioner och krav till verklig systemarkitektur.* 




  





  





**Din vardag som Systemarkitekt:** 




 Hos oss kommer du att ha en central och avgörande roll i vår tekniska miljö. Du är länken som binder samman våra utvecklingsteam med övrig IT/Verksamhet.
 



  





  





**I rollen kommer du bland annat att:** 



* Utveckla och vidareutveckla arkitekturen för våra samhällsviktiga kärnsystem, där robusthet och säkerhet är högsta prioritet.



  




* Omvandla verksamhetens krav till en tekniskt hållbar systemarkitektur och säkerställa att lösningarna möter såväl dagens som morgondagens behov.



  




* Stötta våra utvecklingsteam genom att skapa tydliga riktlinjer och best practices inom utveckling, integration och infrastruktur.



  




* Bistå med expertis kring integrationer, API:er och systeminfrastruktur i Azure-molnmiljö och on-prem-lösningar.



  




* Samarbeta tätt med andra roller i teamet för att optimera vårt releaseförfarande och bidra till en smidig och stabil drift av våra system.



  





  





  





**Vad vi erbjuder dig:** 




  




* En arbetsmiljö där dina idéer och initiativ värdesätts.
* Goda möjligheter till personlig utveckling.
* Kollegor med ett stort engagemang och en stark laganda.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med samhällskritisk teknik som ständigt behöver finnas tillgänglig.
* En flexibel arbetsmiljö där du har möjlighet att arbeta i en hybridlösning - en kombination av arbete på vårt kontor i centrala Stockholm och på distans.



  





  





**Vem är du?** 




 Vi tror att du har haft en liknande roll tidigare, kanske som Lead Developer, Systemarkitekt eller Techlead och att du har en solid bakgrund inom systemutveckling.
 



  





  





**Du har:** 



* Gedigen erfarenhet av att arbeta med utveckling inom .NET-plattformen. (.Net Core, Angular mm.)



  




* En passion för att designa och vidareutveckla hållbara och robusta tekniska lösningar.



  




* Djup förståelse för API:er och integrationer – både i nya och äldre system.



  




* Erfarenhet av systemarkitektur och att modernisera äldre system.



  





  





 I denna roll kommer ditt fokus att ligga på arkitektur och att ha ett helikopterperspektiv på lösningarna. Du är flexibel och kan stötta utvecklingsteamen när det behövs.
 



 Vi ser gärna att du stöttar utvecklingsteamen när det behövs – kanske tycker du fortfarande att det är roligt att skriva kod ibland?
 



 Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av att arbeta nära IT-drift och en god förståelse för IT-infrastruktur.
 



  





  





  





**Ansökan** 




 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med House of Skills.
 



 Har du frågor? Kontakta gärna Linda Freij (
 
 linda.freij@houseofskills.se
 
 ) eller Linda Mukka (
 
 linda.mukka@houseofskills.se
 
 ).
 



 Urval sker löpande, så tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
 



***Mer om SOS Alarm***




*Vi på SOS Alarm arbetar för ett tryggare Sverige för alla. Det gör vi genom att hjälpa människor i nödsituationer, hantera larm, koordinera arbete vid olyckor och kriser, samt genom att aktivt bevaka händelser och trender på nationell och global nivå. Vi gör allt detta i samverkan med våra kunder och partners - dygnet runt, årets alla dagar. Många är framför allt bekanta med vår leverans av det nationella nödnumret 112, men vi erbjuder även ett växande antal innovativa tjänster för både den privata och offentliga marknaden.* 




*SOS Alarm genomför säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll på sin personal enligt kraven ur säkerhetsskyddslag (2018:585). Även en kontroll enligt Lag (1974:191) om bevakningsföretag utförs och är aktiv under anställningsperioden. Drogtest utan anmärkning är en förutsättning för anställning. Tjänsten innebär även krigsplacering vid SOS Alarm.*

title: Backend Developer
description:
At Viaplay Group, we entertain millions of people every day through our streaming services, radio networks, and TV channels. We believe in the power of content not just as a way of telling stories and touching lives, but also expanding worlds.
   

  

 We’re looking for the best people to join us on our journey. Right now, we’re searching for a
 **Backend Developer** 
 to our
 **User Platform Team** 
 for our
 **Stockholm** 
 office – are you ready to hit play on an exciting career change?
   

  

**The Role**
 As a Backend Developer at Viaplay, you will have the opportunity to build the most sought-after streaming service in the Nordics. You will be at the forefront of digital media and develop the platform for our continuously growing user base. Your engagement will shape the future of our service as you will be involved in defining the future for video on demand and live streaming. You will be part of growing the platform, enhance our user experience, and create the next generation of streaming services.
   

  

 We thrive in using the latest technology, always keeping up to date and constantly develop our ways of working. We work with Node.js and Rust in a micro-services architecture that runs in AWS. Also, we build our whole product here in-house.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For**
 We are looking for a team player that wants to join us building strong and high performing solutions. We take care of our services mainly for the user authentication journey that are built primarily in Node.js using both instances and serverless using an event driven architecture that are deployed in AWS. Our ways of working emphasizes a shared ownership approach where we learn from each other.
   

  

**It’s a bonus if you have:** 
  

  

* Experience with frontend development


 What we offer you
   

  

* We’ve got you covered! 30 days of paid vacation every year, an attractive pension and insurance scheme, and generous parental leave pay lift.
* Your wellbeing matters. We provide you with various wellbeing initiatives including wellness allowance.
* A safe space to grow and up-skill. Our learning culture puts you in the driver’s seat of your own development.
* An innovative environment with Hack Days once a year. This week-long initiative allows you to think outside the box and deliver creative, technical solutions that (more often than not) go on to be implemented, either in our product or our ways of working.
* Entertainment is what we love, and entertainment is what we do. So, unlimited access to Viaplay seems only fair for you to get to know the product – including serier & viewing events, new release movie rentals, linear channels and more.


**Hit play** 
**today**
 If this feels like your kind of challenge, make sure you apply by attaching your CV here – you may also want to add your LinkedIn profile. Please don’t send us your application via email because we won’t be able to accept it. We do, however, welcome any questions you may have about this particular position.
   

  

 Want to learn more about who we are and what we do? Check out our careers page or follow us on Instagram! We’re only ever a few clicks away.

title: Fullstack Angular + Django Developer
description:
The Role
 



 We are looking for an awesome Fullstack developer who will be contributing to the growth of Toborrow and help our team to achieve new ambitious goals!
 



 We are looking for someone that feels comfortable in solving problems with code. And who gets excited about tackling challenges. We are open to all levels of experience for this position – junior to senior.
 



 Our journey just started and you will have the opportunity to impact our future as a fast-growing tech company. You will be a part of driving the change in how people perceive banking and financial services for the better. Together we build a platform that is easy-to-use and scalable services.
 



 For us the most important is who you are, your potential and your drive.
 



  





 What we offer you
 



 You will work with skilled, friendly, and creative people. We encourage you to make your ideas happen and you will have the possibility to work with several Fintech projects. We have a cool office in Stockholm city centre, and we have a lot of fun in the process building this company. Of course, we have flexible working hours as well.
 



  





 Key responsibilities include but are not limited to
 


* Take part in process of building/improving architecture of backend and frontend projects
* Designing, creating and implementing APIs
* Writing unit tests, integration and E2E tests
* Take part in Sprint Plannings
* Take part in Deployment processes
* Implementation of security measures and routines
* Suggest appropriate tools best suited to the business requirements
* Contribute to internal documentation on architecture and developed features



  





 Techniques
 



 Angular, Python, Django, Postgresql, Git, Nginx, REST API, Design Patterns
 



  





 We believe that you
 


* Have experience working with Angular and Django
* Have an academic background
* Can convey ideas and opinions in a clear way
* You have a true passion for tech and interest in financial products



  





 Extra awesome but not required
 



 Finance work experience,
 




 Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Playwright
 




  





 For more information or questions please contact us at asker@toborrow.com
 



  





 Perks and benefits
 



 This job comes with several perks and benefits
 


* Flexible working hours
* Free coffee / tea
* Social gatherings
* Near public transit
* Free office snacks
* Pension plan
* Maternity / paternity leave
* Healthcare insurance
* New tech gear
* Remote work allowed
* Central office
* Skill development



  





 About Toborrow
 



 Four out of five jobs in Sweden are created by small companies. But in order to ensure growth company often needs financing. For many businesses it is a great challenge. Our vision has been to democratize the loan market and to help companies obtain financing on the best possible terms. Toborrow offers a simple comparison service for companies where we collect loan offers from different lenders and banks.

title: Senior Backend Developer 9 Months Contract
description:
We are now looking for a
 **Senior Backend Developer** 
 (Java) who can help us drive this change in claims management in a newly established claims management team.
   

  

 ﻿
   

  

**About the service**

 As a Senior Backend Developer, you will play a key role in developing and consolidating claims management capabilities to improve customer experience. You will work in a cross-functional team consisting of UX designer, architect and 3-4 developers, with a clear mission and mandate.

 Kubernetes

 Devops

title: Software Integration Engineer
description:
**About Applied Intuition**
 Applied Intuition is a vehicle software supplier that accelerates the adoption of safe and intelligent machines worldwide. Founded in 2017, Applied Intuition delivers the AI-powered ADAS/AD toolchain, Vehicle OS, and autonomy stack to help customers shorten time to market, build high-quality systems, and create next-generation consumer experiences. 18 of the top 20 global automakers trust Applied Intuition’s solutions to drive the production of modern vehicles. Applied Intuition serves the automotive, trucking, construction, mining, agriculture, and defense industries and is headquartered in Mountain View, CA, with offices in San Diego, CA, Ft. Walton Beach, FL, Ann Arbor and Detroit, MI, Washington, D.C., Stuttgart, Munich, Stockholm, Seoul, and Tokyo. Learn more at appliedintuition.com.
   

  

*We are an in-office company, and our expectation is that employees primarily work from their Applied Intuition office 5 days a week. However, we also recognize the importance of flexibility and trust our employees to manage their schedules responsibly. This may include occasional remote work, starting the day with morning meetings from home before heading to the office, or leaving earlier when needed to accommodate family commitments.* 
 (Note: this is not applicable for EpiSci roles).
   

  

**Meet our engineers on the Vehicle OS team!**
 Vehicle OS is a flexible suite of products that help vehicle manufacturers develop, deploy, and update complete vehicle software and AI applications. Learn more about what the team is building, the team culture, and why it’s one of the most exciting projects at Applied Intuition.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a software integration engineer who can champion the delivery of features in our newest product. This involves working across software and hardware to ensure that the full system is integrated together seamlessly when it needs to be delivered to the customer.
   

  

**At Applied Intuition, you will:**
* Deliver full-system features that span software and hardware that meet customer requirements
* Directly interact with the customers to identify the target use-cases, then manage the project to complete the integration
* Work cross-functionally with the product, software, mechanical and electrical teams to develop and deploy systems
* Develop a deep understanding of the entire system architecture and how the software and hardware components interact
* Design and bring up test rigs needed for end-to-end testing and validation of system performance
* Test and troubleshoot integration between various components to ensure reliability


**We're looking for someone who has:**
* 2+ years of experience in software integration or development
* An understanding of electronic systems and how how to setup and debug them
* Experience with developing or testing software applications
* Software development experience in Python or C/C++
* Familiarity with Linux development and Bash scripting


**Nice to have:**
* Experience in the automotive industry and working with automotive technologies including CAN, LIN, Ethernet, Simulink, AUTOSAR, etc
* Experience interacting with customers to deliver projects that meet their requirements
* Experience developing software for large projects (CI/CD, release process, etc)
* Familiarity with developing software for embedded systems
* Skills in other adjacent areas (CAD/3D printing, PCB design, etc)


**Benefits and** 
**perks** 
 :
   

  

* Lunch and dinner allowance
* Fitness (600 USD) and learning stipends (1,000 USD) annually
* Stock options


*Don’t meet every single requirement? If you’re excited about this role but your past experience doesn’t align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyway. You may be just the right candidate for this or other roles.*
*Applied Intuition is an equal opportunity employer and federal contractor or subcontractor. Consequently, the parties agree that, as applicable, they will abide by the requirements of 41 CFR 60-1.4(a), 41 CFR 60-300.5(a) and 41 CFR 60-741.5(a) and that these laws are incorporated herein by reference. These regulations prohibit discrimination against qualified individuals based on their status as protected veterans or individuals with disabilities, and prohibit discrimination against all individuals based on their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or national origin. These regulations require that covered prime contractors and subcontractors take affirmative action to employ and advance in employment individuals without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status or disability. The parties also agree that, as applicable, they will abide by the requirements of Executive Order 13496 (29 CFR Part 471, Appendix A to Subpart A), relating to the notice of employee rights under federal labor laws.*

title: Android Developer to Digital Channels | SEB, Stockholm
description:
Private and Corporate Digital Channels mission is to provide a world-class customer experience for SEB customers. The channels we are covering are different segments within our Business, such as Internet bank, Business arena, Mobile applications and Nexus.
   

  

 Now we are seeking for our new star in Android development who is driven to influence our application development for the present and for the future!
   

  

**About The Role**
 As an Android Developer you will work with development of the SEB ID application. SEB ID is an authentication method designed to enhance access to SEB’s digital channels. You will be a part of a cross functional team consisting of colleagues working with development, test and integration. In the role you will develop, maintain, design and implement new user-facing features. You will collaborate with a large variety of colleagues both from the IT and Business area. The application will be used by a large number of consumers; therefore, we are actively ensuring that it is robust, scalable and accessible 24/7/365.
   

  

 Another important part of your role is to pay attention to the practices and methodologies used in mobile development and share the knowledge with other team members.
   

  

**To thrive in this role, we believe that you have**
 To succeed in this role, you take your own initiative in a technically competent team. As a person you can be constructive in a group and be inspired by taking responsibility and driving change through new technology. Thus, you will have the ability to collaborate with multiple colleagues, strong communication skills, driven and have an analytical mindset. You have a great interest in tools, architecture and design.
   

  

 We believe that you have:
   

  

* Experience in working with Native Android development in Java / Kotlin
* Experience in working with WebViews and developing hybrid apps
* Experience of working with REST Api is desirable, experience in web development (HTML, CSS, Javascript) is meritorious
* Fluency in English is required as it is our corporate language


**What We Offer**
 We offer many experiences and benefits to our employees, and there is nuance to every individual’s career experience, but the elements that define the core of our offering are:
   

  

* Entrepreneurial Scandinavian environment
* Hybrid work model, meaning remote work is possible up to 2 days/week
* International opportunities and working environment
* Attractive compensation and access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than 2025-04-17. If you have questions about the position, please contact David Östberg, hiring manager, at david.ostberg@seb.se or Madeleine Gustâv, Talent Acquisition Partner, at madeleine.gustav@seb.se , but we will not process applications via email.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 Learn more about working at SEB on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: Erfaren frontendutvecklare till framtidens skolplattform - Meitner
description:
Tycker du att skolplattformen som du hade när du gick i skolan var perfekt? - Det tycker inte vi på Meitner. Kom och hjälp oss på Meitner att höja ribban rejält på hur en modern skolplattform ska se ut och fungera. Vi bygger en allt-i-ett-lösning för lärare, elever, vårdnadshavare och administratörer. Det går bra, riktigt bra, men vi behöver fler utvecklare!
   

  

 Vad vi erbjuder
   

  

 Som utvecklare på Meitner är man en del av ett tight och engagerat gäng på cirka 20 personer. Tack vare att man får jobba med experter inom produktutveckling (designers, erfarna frontendutvecklare och backendutvecklare och produktägare) och domänexperter (tidigare rektorer, lärare och administratörer) så lär man sig nya saker varje dag.
   

  

 Dessutom är det högt i tak. Hos oss får alla idéer plats och varje insats räknas. Vi levererar funktioner snabbt, testar dem ute i verkligheten och förbättrar produkten i nära samarbete med våra användare.
   

  

 Om rollen
   

  

**Som Utvecklare Hos Oss Kommer Du Att**
* Bryta ner tekniskt komplexa problem till konkreta lösningar
* Arbeta tätt med produktansvariga, designers, customer success och andra utvecklare
* Skriva specifikationer, modellera koncept och realisera funktioner
* Bidra till förbättrad developer experience och teamets gemensamma kompetensutveckling


 Kvalifikationer
   

  

**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* Minst sju års erfarenhet av kommersiell mjukvaruutveckling, gärna i större SaaS-projekt
* Minst fem års erfarenhet av React och TypeScript
* God kommunikationsförmåga på både svenska och engelska
* En samarbetsinriktad inställning och förmåga att arbeta självständigt
* En vilja att lära sig och ständigt bli bättre!


 Meriterande
   

  

* Jobbat med stora system
* Erfarenhet av Go
* Erfarenhet av Java
* Erfarenhet av Next.js
* AWS
* Docker / Kubernetes

 We offer many experiences and benefits to our employees, and there is nuance to every individual’s career experience, but the elements that define the core of our offering are:

* International opportunities and working environment
* Attractive compensation and access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than 2025-04-17. If you have questions about the position, please contact David Östberg, hiring manager, at david.ostberg@seb.se or Madeleine Gustâv, Talent Acquisition Partner, at madeleine.gustav@seb.se , but we will not process applications via email.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 Learn more about working at SEB on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: Senior AI Developer
description:
**Senior AI Developer – Prompt Engineering & AI-Agentutveckling** 




  






 Vill du utveckla AI-lösningar i framkant och forma nästa generations intelligenta system? 
 





 På Nordisk Ai får du en nyckelroll i att utveckla skalbara, affärskritiska AI-lösningar som gör verklig skillnad för företag.
 





 Vi söker en Senior AI Developer med expertis inom prompt engineering och AI-agentutveckling. Rollen är perfekt för dig som har en djup teknisk förståelse för stora språkmodeller (LLMs) och erfarenhet av att bygga, optimera och implementera AI-drivna system.
 




  





**Om Nordisk Ai** 





 På Nordisk Ai gör vi AI enkelt för alla. Vi hjälper företag att förstå, implementera och dra nytta av AI utan onödig komplexitet. Genom att kombinera avancerad teknik med en användarvänlig approach skapar vi innovativa AI-lösningar som ger företag en konkurrensfördel.
 





 Vi är en snabbväxande startup där innovation, samarbete och teknisk expertis står i centrum. Vi jobbar i gränslandet mellan AI-forskning och affärsnytta, och nu söker vi en senior utvecklare som vill vara med och ta Nordisk AI till nästa nivå.
 




  





**Om rollen** 





 Som Senior AI Developer hos Nordisk AI får du en central roll i vårt AI-team. Du kommer att arbeta med att utveckla, optimera och implementera AI-drivna agenter och avancerade AI-lösningar.
 





 Detta är en strategisk och tekniskt avancerad roll där du får stor frihet och möjlighet att påverka AI-utvecklingen hos både Nordisk AI och våra kunder.
 




  





**Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:** 



* Strategi och utveckling – Driva utvecklingen av AI-drivna agenter för automatisering och affärsprocesser.
* Prompt engineering & optimering – Skapa och finjustera prompts för att förbättra precision, relevans och svarstid i LLM-modeller.
* Modellutveckling & AI-optimering – Träna, finjustera och optimera AI-modeller för specifika användningsområden.
* AI-arkitektur & systemintegration – Implementera och integrera AI-lösningar i tekniska ekosystem.
* MLOps & deployment – Sätta upp CI/CD-pipelines och hantera drift av AI-modeller i molnmiljöer.
* Tekniskt ledarskap – Vara en expert inom AI och NLP, dela kunskap och vägleda team inom AI-strategi och best practices.



  





**Vi söker dig som:** 



* Har en relevant utbildning eller gedigen erfarenhet inom AI.
* Har minst 2-5 års erfarenhet av AI-utveckling, LLM, NLP eller maskininlärning.
* Har god förståelse för GPT-4, Claude, Gemini eller andra LLM-modeller.
* Har djup kunskap inom prompt engineering och erfarenhet av att optimera språkmodeller.
* Har stark programmeringskunskap och erfarenhet av relevanta AI-ramverk.
* Har erfarenhet av att bygga AI-drivna applikationer och konversationsagenter.
* Är flytande i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift (krav).



  





**Meriterande:** 



* Tidigare erfarenhet från startup-miljö och B2B-projekt.
* Kunskap inom WordPress, MemberPress och andra ledande AI-modeller.



  





**Varför Nordisk Ai?** 



* Teknisk innovation – Vi arbetar med den senaste AI-tekniken och experimenterar kontinuerligt med LLM, reinforcement learning och AI-automatisering.
* Frihet att påverka – Som senior AI-utvecklare får du stor teknisk frihet att välja verktyg, sätta riktlinjer och påverka vår AI-strategi.
* Snabbväxande team – Vi är en agil och snabbfotad organisation där beslut fattas snabbt och idéer snabbt omsätts i handling.
* AI på riktigt – Vi jobbar inte bara med AI som en trend, utan som en affärskritisk funktion för våra kunder.
* Entreprenöriell anda – Nytänkande och experimentlusta är en naturlig del av vår vardag.



  





**Hos oss får du:** 



* Stort inflytande – Du är med och formar våra produkter, vår tech-stack och vår övergripande AI-strategi.
* Flexibelt arbetssätt – Vi erbjuder hybridlösning med möjlighet att arbeta på distans.
* Snabbhet & innovation – Vi är en snabbfotad organisation där idéer snabbt kan bli verklighet, och där experimenterande är en självklar del av vardagen.
* Ett dedikerat team – Du jobbar tillsammans med andra experter i ett tight, kunnigt och engagerat team där alla brinner för AI på riktigt.



  





 Vill du vara med och bygga framtidens AI-lösningar med verklig påverkan? Då har vi plats för dig.
 



  





**Så ansöker du** 





 Är du redo att bygga nästa generations AI-agenter?
 




  






 Skicka in din ansökan med CV och en kort beskrivning om vem du är som person.
 





 Plats: Stockholm (eller remote för rätt kandidat).
 





 Start: Enligt överenskommelse.
 





 Anställningsform: Heltid, tillsvidare.
 





 Urval sker löpande, ansök så snart som möjligt.
 




  






 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig.
 





 Välkommen till Nordisk Ai – där vi gör AI enkelt för alla.

title: Utvecklare med nätkunskap – Stockholm, Malmö, Umeå
description:
Om tjänsten
   

  

 Vi söker dig som kan ta Bahnhofs nätverk till nästa nivå, med mjukvara i fokus. I rollen som utvecklare blir du del av ett team som arbetar med att bygga smartare nätverk, och utveckla avancerade nätverktyg. Redan under din första månad kommer du att få automatisera tjänsteprovisionering, förbättra monitorering och bygga mjukvarukomponenter för nya nätverksarkitekturer. Du kommer att bekanta dig med flera nätverksplattformar och utvecklas inom både frontend- och backendutveckling.
   

  

 Tjänsten utgår från något av Bahnhofs kontor i Stockholm, Malmö eller Umeå.
   

  

 Om dig
   

  

 Tjänsten ställer höga krav på dig som problemlösare och utvecklare. Nätkunskap är avgörande för att lyckas, men även för dig med gedigen erfarenhet finns stora möjligheter att utvecklas och lära dig nya saker. Du tar initiativ till lösningar där det saknas utstakade vägar, och är orädd inför nya utmaningar, plattformar och tekniker. Erfarenhet från liknande roller inom telekom värderas högt.
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet inom några av följande områden:
   

  

**Språk** 
 : C, Python, Perl, Go, PHP/Vue.js, Bash
   

  

**Operativsystem** 
 : Linux, Cisco IOS, IOS XE, IOS XR, VRP
   

  

**Koncept/system** 
 : DHCP, CGNAT, K8s, PowerDNS, BNG, ZTP, Docker, Ansible, Prometheus
   

  

 Om Bahnhof
   

  

 Bahnhof är en ledande internetoperatör med bredbands- och nättjänster i teknisk framkant, både för privatpersoner och företag. Vi gillar att utmana gamla sanningar, och söker just nu en kreativ utvecklare som vill vara med när vi expanderar, och bidra till nästa generations nät.
   

  

 Ansökan
   

  

 Mejla ansökan märkt ”Utvecklare Nät” till jobb@bahnhof.net senast den
 **4 april** 
 , inklusive personligt brev, CV och löneanspråk.
   

  

 Vi genomför intervjuer löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag, så vänta inte för länge! Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Har du frågor om tjänsten? Hör av dig till Philip Göransson via philip.goransson@bahnhof.net.
   

  

*Tack, men nej tack. Vi undanber oss vänligt men bestämt all kontakt från rekryteringsbolag.*

title: Microservices Engineer
description:
This is a general selection track for teams that focus on back-end REST API microservices engineering in Go and Python. It covers all levels of seniority. Apply here if you are already an outstanding engineer with crisp and well-articulated views on APIs, microservice design, engineering processes and DevOps.
   

  

 Our services need to scale to handle millions of Ubuntu clients, and collaboration across thousands of community members. They are also central to the health of critical infrastructure across the globe. As Ubuntu has been embraced by mainstream enterprise computing through the adoption of cloud and developer-centric tech strategy, the quality of these services has become more important to customers and users.
   

  

 While Ubuntu has been enormously successful and in many senses leads the industry, we think we can substantially improve our practices, quality and performance in the web services domain. We are growing our teams, and in doing so we aim to level up our insights on scalability, performance, resilience and DevOps practices.
   

  

 Key areas of interest for us are:
   

  

* API design, documentation, and governance
* Database performance design considerations and skills
* Multi-region service delivery for resilience and performance
* Fuzzing and other proactive security analysis techniques
* Tracing and profiling for distributed systems insights
* Next-generation DevOps practices


**Location** 
 : we have microservices teams with open roles in every time zone.
   

  

 What your day will look like
   

  

* Write high-quality, well-designed, and robust software that works at scale
* Design APIs and software architecture for collegial review
* Write tests that validate software behaviour
* Build and maintain reliable, fault-tolerant applications and services
* Collaborate proactively with a globally distributed team
* Display technical leadership internally and within our external communities
* Debug issues and produce high-quality solutions to resolve them
* Contribute to technical documentation to make it the best of its kind
* Discuss, contribute to, and collaborate across teams at Canonical
* Work from home with global travel twice annually for company events


 What we are looking for in you
   

  

* An exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
* Undergraduate degree in Computer Science or STEM, or a compelling narrative about your alternative path
* Drive and a track record of going above-and-beyond expectations
* Proficiency in Python and / or Go
* History of writing modern, maintainable software
* Experience with relational and non-relational database systems
* Continuous integration and continuous delivery experience
* Experience with systems programming or scalable web services
* Professional written and spoken English
* Experience with Linux (Debian or Ubuntu preferred)
* Excellent interpersonal skills, curiosity, flexibility, and accountability
* Passion, thoughtfulness, and self-motivation
* Excellent communication and presentation skills
* Result-oriented, with a personal drive to meet commitments
* Ability to travel twice a year, for company events up to two weeks each


**Additional Skills That You Might Also Bring**
* Experience with container tech such as LXD, Docker, and Kubernetes
* Understanding of build systems and toolchains
* Experience with cross-compilation
* Experience with hyperscale public clouds and / or private clouds
* Experience with designing, building, and running distributed systems
* Performance engineering and security experience


 What we offer you
   

  

 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Employee Assistance Programme
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world on a daily basis. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Canonical has been a remote-first company since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

 Canonical is an equal opportunity employer
   

  

 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Business Developer
description:
**Who we are** 




 We are Elaway! We exist to accelerate the green transition in Europe, from fossil fuels to electricity. We make EV charging easy for housing communities, removing the hassle from installation and operation.
 



 With a team of 60+ passionate individuals across Europe, we're already the leading provider of car charging facilities for housing communities. Now, we’re looking for a Business Developer to help us grow smarter and faster.
 



  





**Why join us** 




 If you want to make a difference to the world and contribute to the green shift while having a lot of fun, this is your opportunity! You will work with amazing colleagues across Europe and be a central piece of our growth journey 🚀.
 



  





**This is your role** 




 You’ll play a key role in shaping
 
 Elaway’s future, identifying opportunities, and executing high-impact initiatives aligned with our strategy.
 


* **Drive Strategic Growth** 
 – Lead projects that boost revenue, improve margins, and optimize costs.
* **Master M&A** 
 – Analyze markets, evaluate opportunities, and manage seamless deal integrations.
* **Expand Our Reach** 
 – Identify and assess new or adjacent markets and segments to fuel expansion.



  





**Who are you** 




 You're eager for a
 **fast-paced, high-impact** 
 role in a scale-up environment. You thrive when balancing strategy and execution—because spotting an opportunity is only half the job; making it happen is where the magic is.
 


* A
 **strategic thinker** 
 who turns analysis into action.
* Skilled at
 **juggling multiple projects** 
 and adapting to change.
* An
 **effective communicator** 
 who aligns and motivates teams around bold goals.
* Passionate about
 **discovering new opportunities** 
 that create real business impact.
* You bring at least
 **one unique hobby or interest** 
 —because a well-rounded life fuels success.



  





**What You Bring** 



* **Proven experience** 
 in developing, implementing, and executing business strategies.
* **Scale-up experience** 
 is a plus—things move fast here.
* At least
 **3 years of relevant experience** 
 —we care about results, not just titles.



 In terms of languages, you need to be fluent in English. Additionally, we consider it an advantage if you also speak a Nordic language.
 



  





**We love our values - and so should you** 




 A cultural fit is crucial to thrive at Elaway. That's why we need to ensure that you can relate to our values:
 



 🚘
 **Drivers first** 
 – O
 *ur customers, the drivers using our chargers, always come first* 




 🎯
 **Focused execution** 
 –
 *We make bold choices, prioritizing what truly matters* 




 and last but not least;
 



 💖
 **Empowered by People** 
 –
 *Together, we are building a better tomorrow* 




  





 If you can relate to these and love them as much as we do, then we might possibly be a perfect match!
 



 We truly do hope that we are just what you're looking for, and if so we would love to hear from you.
 



  





  





 The application deadline is
 **April 11th, 2025** 
 .
 



  





*Please note that our company language is English – therefore, we ask you to send your CV and application in English.*

title: Linux Support Engineer
description:
Grow with us
   

  

 Our team is responsible for a Yocto-based distribution used internally across the company. We pride ourselves on fostering a collaborative and innovative environment, and we're looking for talented support engineers with a solid Linux background to join our team.
   

  

 As support engineer, you will be a crucial point of contact for our users, providing expert guidance and solutions to ensure smooth and efficient handling of problems they encounter. You will be part of a tightly knit team of senior engineers who value collaboration and innovation. We operate in a hybrid work model, with most of the team based in Stockholm (Kista).
   

  

 Key Responsibilities:
   

  

* Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues or questions reported by our users.
* Serve as the point of contact for technical staff using our Yocto-based distribution, leading efforts to resolve issues.
* Collaborate with team members to ensure speedy resolution of issues.
* Contribute to improvements in our deliveries based on feedback and support cases.
* Provide relevant data to track and enhance the team's support performance.
* Contribute relevant improvements upstream to the Yocto community.


 Join our Team
   

  

 Qualifications:
   

  

* M.S. Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering, or equivalent experience.
* Solution-oriented mindset with a focus on delivering exceptional service.
* Solid experience with Linux, both as a user and developer.
* Experience working with Yocto and supporting complex technical products.
* Proficiency with tracking systems such as Bugzilla and Jira.
* Familiarity with open-source community norms and behaviors.
* Strong communication skills in written and spoken English.


 Location: Stockholm (Kista), with flexibility for other cities in Sweden.
   

  

 ]]>

title: Senior ServiceNow Developer
description:
If you love finding innovative solutions to improve complex systems, there’s a digital revolution underway with plenty of tough problems to solve and we have a great team to tackle the future. We are searching for a senior ServiceNow developer to join our growing practice. We are based out of Stockholm, and we prefer that are candidates live and reside where they work.
   

  

 If you are the right candidate for the role, you will play a key role in configuring new and existing environments for our customers. You will act as a technical designer for ServiceNow code and architecture, work with architects and implementation consultants in order to build solutions and processes, supporting maintenance, continual service improvement, and help lead the work in regards to growing our capabilities on the ServiceNow platform.
   

  

 From public service transformation to cutting-edge commercial projects, our work has a wide reach, helping make the everyday easier, for everyone. When you start your CGI story, not only will you be improving people’s lives, but you can also be sure we’ll do the same for you.
   

  

 Alongside a competitive salary, we offer you access to our share scheme (3.5% + 3.5% matching) making you a CGI partner and not just an employee.
   

  

 As for the future? We work as one team and are a Top 100 employer. Be a successful part of our story and we’ll support you in taking your career anywhere you want it to go.
   

  

 Your future duties and responsibilities
   

  

* Technical designer and developer for ServiceNow code and architecture, responsible for overall ServiceNow code quality
* Design, prototype, implement, test, and deploy business rules, technical solutions, such as JavaScript, UI pages/actions/policies, scheduled job, import sets and transform maps, ACLs and notifications
* Develop custom integration components (SSO, CMDB, SAS connectors etc.) and integrate legacy systems with ServiceNow using mid-server, web services, chatOps, email and other relevant technologies
* Develop existing and custom applications within ServiceNow including integrations with other applications
* Hands-on experience in developing the Service Portal and Service Catalogue
* Create and use update sets to move customizations between ServiceNow instances
* Design for and maintain a highly available and recoverable environment
* Provide administrative ServiceNow support, including advanced support via troubleshooting, implementing bug fixes and root cause analysis
* Document, maintain and update policies, procedures and controls for the operation of the ServiceNow platform and its SDLC
* Responsible for reviewing requirements to ensure that they are provided in sufficient detail to be accurately estimated
* Work with process managers to fully understand business functionality, pain points, and areas of improvements
* Commit to the continuous improvement and learning of development and ServiceNow best practices, tools and technology
* Proactively keep ServiceNow skills current


**Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This Role**
* Demonstrable experience of ServiceNow development and IT service management process design
* ServiceNow System Admin Certification
* ServiceNow Implementation Certifications, i.e. the platform, ITSM, CSM, ITBM, ITOM, HRSD, SecOps and GRC
* Overarching understanding of ServiceNow Enterprise product suite
* Fundamental understanding of the key technologies relevant to the ServiceNow integration solutions including: ServiceNow API’s, SSO, SAML, SSL, Web Services, LDAP, JDBC, ODBC, REST, SCP, FTPS
* Ability to apply business concepts into a technical solution
* Web portal development skills, such as HTML, CSS, Angular JS, bootstrap
* Experience implementing the following Core Process Areas: Incident, Problem, Change, Service Catalogue, Request, and CMDB
* Ability to create reports using the standard reporting engine, plus metrics and SLAs
* Follow ServiceNow best practices (including scripting, security, implementation)
* Display aptitude in learning new modules based on training materials
* Experience with collaboration across functional borders enterprise-wise (i.e. within and outside of IT)
* ITIL foundation certification
* Excellent interpersonal, communication, collaboration and documentation skills
* Clear written and verbal communication skills


**Would you like to know more?**
 We look forward to hearing from you! If there is still something you are wondering about, feel free to contact ca.larsson@cgi.com
   

  

 Background checks and security checks may be required.
   

  

****What We At CGI Offer You****
 CGI's combination of global and local presence, with offices in 30 locations in Sweden, provides satisfied clients but also means that you as an employee always have an office near you. You will feel your work is valued at both an organizational level and on the career growth aspect. This in combination with flexible working hours gives you the opportunity for a balance between private life and work, no matter where in life you are.
   

  

 Benefits for our employees:
   

  

* Parental pay: We pay up to about 90% of your salary during your first period of staying home
* CGI Employee Stock Purchase Plan: As a shareholder, you have the opportunity to influence and in our stock purchase program, CGI matches your contribution, up to 3% of your monthly salary
* Wellness allowance: We offer an annual wellness allowance of 4,000 SEK
* Secure employment: Our consultants all have collective agreements and insurance
* Pension plan: We offer attractive pension solutions
* Beneficial Car leasing : The car is used as a private car but is leased by CGI.


**Together, as owners, let’s turn meaningful insights into action.**
 Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you’ll reach your full potential because…
   

  

 You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That’s why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company’s strategy and direction.
   

  

 Your work creates value. You’ll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.
   

  

 You’ll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You’ll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.
   

  

 Come join our team—one of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.

title: Utvecklare till Köket.se
description:
Köket.se är en del av TV4, ett av Sveriges största mediehus. Köket erbjuder inspirerande och engagerande matinnehåll genom TV-program, recept, artiklar, videoklipp, onlinekurser, mm. Vi samarbetar med flera av Sveriges populäraste kockar och når varje vecka ut till över 2 miljoner individer genom våra olika kanaler. Vår vision är att bidra med inspiration och matglädje för alla.
   

  

**Webbutvecklare till Köket.se**
 Kom och jobba på en riktigt bra arbetsplats, Köket.se, en av Sveriges största matsajter! Just nu söker vi en webbutvecklare med fokus på frontend.
   

  

 Rollen som webbutvecklare är en del av Kökets team och utgör en viktig del i vårt utvecklingsteam som ansvarar för allt utvecklingsarbete av vår viktigaste kanal, Köket.se. I Kökets team ingår även redaktörer, säljare, producenter, analytiker, produktionsledare, fotografer, redigerare och affärsutvecklare. Du blir en del av ett grymt bra team med stort driv och engagemang där mat, bak och dryck är gemensamma intressen.
   

  

**Så här jobbar vi**
 Vi är ett litet utvecklingsteam som har kul och jobbar bra ihop. Hos oss får du jobba med varierande arbetsuppgifter och med alla delar av sajten och CMSet. Vi har korta beslutsvägar och releasar kontinuerligt. Vi prioriterar och lägger upp arbetet gemensamt i gruppen. Om någon kör fast eller om det uppstår något som behöver flera ögon, kollar vi tillsammans.
   

  

 Kodkvalitet är viktigt för oss och vi programmerar i TypeScript, genomför peer-reviews och gör omfattande testning. Vi har också regelbundet hackdays och utbildningsdagar för att öka kunskapen kring nya tekniker.
   

  

 När vi ses på kontoret har vi ofta gemensamma aktiviteter som lunchträning och fika. Om vi har tur får vi provsmaka något som våra Köket-profiler lagar eller bakar i Köket-studion.
   

  

**Vad vi behöver**
 Vi hoppas att du, som vi, gillar att samarbeta, är lyhörd, gärna delar med dig av kunskap och håller dig ajour med teknikutvecklingen inom ditt område.
   

  

 Du Behöver Kunna Prata Svenska Obehindrat. Det Är Meriterande Om Du Har Mer Än 2 Års Erfarenhet Inom Flera Av Nedanstående Områden
   

  

* CSS
* React
* Next.js
* TypeScript
* Node.js
* Prisma
* MongoDB
* Molnbaserad hosting, tex Render.com
* DevOps som t.ex. deployscript och automatiserad testning


**Om TV4**
 Vi samlar Sverige, varje dag och dygnet runt, sen 30 år tillbaka. Vi står för ett brett innehåll med engagerande nyheter, storslagen underhållning, direktsänd sport och högklassigt drama.
   

  

 TV4 Play är hela Sveriges streamingtjänst där användarna hittar allt vårt innehåll. Tillsammans med våra tv-kanaler, Köket och Fotbollskanalen skapar vi möjligheter för såväl medarbetare, tittare, annonsörer och samarbetspartners.
   

  

 TV4:s grund är vår oberoende journalistik, att vi sätter våra användare i centrum och ger hela Sverige innehållsupplevelser som förenar.
   

  

**Praktiskt**
 Vi sitter i TV4-huset på Tegeluddsvägen, ett stenkast från Gärdets t-banestation. I huset finns förutom hela TV4s verksamhet även vår egen Köket-studio, chans att äta gott på vår restaurang och ett eget gym med träningsgrupper. Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med 6 månaders provanställning.
   

  

**Intresserad?**
 Skicka in din ansökan och bli del av vårt team! Vill du veta mer om jobbet, hör gärna av dig till Erik Lidén, Produktägare, Köket.se, erik.liden@tv4.se.
   

  

 Bakgrundskontroll är en del av vår rekryteringsprocess.
   

  

**Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**

title: Senior Backend-utvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Du har erfarenhet av Java Spring Boot och mikrotjänstarkitektur.
* Du har erfarenhet av design av återanvändbara tjänster och integration mot affärssystem.
* Du har erfarenhet av konsolidering av förmågor inom t.ex. bank/försäkring.
* Du har tidigare erfarenhet av Kubernetes (gärna Openshift).
* Du har mer än 7 års erfarenhet som backendutvecklare.
* Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av reglerad bransch (bank/försäkring).
* Eventdriven arkitektur, mainframe-integration, IDP-plattformar är en bonus.
* har du erfarenhet av DevOps/SRE-principer är det meriterande.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 02-04-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.
